<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n624jzTqXk1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/193c4711ae834268093c5b2ce1a63952/tumblr_inline_n624jhcYF91rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p><span class="username offline popupctrl"><strong>WalrusPilot </strong>recently played around with the Procreate app on his iPad and created this marvelous piece based off of Gravity with a <em><strong>KSP</strong></em> influence. Great job overall!</span></p>

Oh My God!

This is marvelous!

Here take all my rep points.

Gravity... don't get me started.

It's a brilliant piece of artwork, though!
I think we just found our new animation style for a KSP Cartoon.

Oooh I love it! Brilliant work!

By the way: I think the KSP Community is one of the most creative community. Just look at all the mods, video wednesdays and Fanwork Fridays! It is everytime awesome stuff! E-ve-ry-time! Just keep that in mind..
